channel.title: [317] Making Max Connections Higher
channel.description: Whenever i try to log into the server from my laptop and my main computer (which both have the same ip), one will login and the other wont because of the limited amount of connections. How do I make the Max Connections higher? I already looked everywhere on the server tutorials, and they're all about how to make the connections limited, not unlimited.
